Pr\u00e9requis: Etre inscrit au Mastère Spécialisé "Infrastructure Project Finance"
Objectifs du module: This course focuses on the hedging instruments used by professionals to manage currency and interest rate risks. - Introduction - The Structure of Options Markets - Principles and Models of Option Pricing - Option Strategies - The Structure of Forward and Futures Markets - Principles of Forward and Futures Pricing - Futures Hedging Strategies - Options on Futures - Foreign Currency Derivatives - Interest Rate Derivatives
Programme du module: Course with examples, case studies Case studies : 50%, examen : 50%.
